body_html:
Anyway, numpy.std and numpy.var divide sum of square by n (see numpy document),
otoh, pytorch divide sum of square by n-1 (source).
So, there should be some differences.
body_text:
Anyway, numpy.std and numpy.var divide sum of square by n (see numpy document),
otoh, pytorch divide sum of square by n-1 (source).
So, there should be some differences.
body:
Anyway, `numpy.std` and `numpy.var` divide sum of square by `n` (see [numpy document](https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy/reference/generated/numpy.std.html)), 
otoh, pytorch divide sum of square by `n-1` ([source](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/THNN/generic/BatchNormalization.c#L54-L58)).
So, there should be some differences.
